data.title: Evanescence and Amy Lee
data.meta_description: Amy Lee is a lead singer of the famous band Evanescence. Amy and her band easily and quickly made the top 100 charts with her debut album, “Fallen”. data.text:
Amy Lee is a lead singer of the famous band Evanescence. Amy and her band easily and quickly made the top 100 charts with her debut album, “Fallen”. But before Amy was famous and selling over four million albums worldwide with a platinum record, Amy was being raised in Little Rock, Arkansas. Her mother raises three other siblings, and her father is a DJ. Ben Moody stated that he met Amy at a youth camp when she was playing a song by famous hard rocker Meatloaf on the piano. Ben Moody went over to Amy to meet her. She began singing for him and Ben was astonished so he suckered her into creating a band. A famous critic quotes,“The band’s aggressive core finds a counterpart in Lee’s passionate lyrics that forge a connection with audiences searching for identity or struggling with feelings of desire, hope, love, and loss.”

Here are some fast facts about Amy Lee, Amy hates fast food including McDonalds and BurgerKing. Her favorite holiday is Halloween. She loves the Victorian Era because they had such cool clothes. Her favorite movie is, “Nightmare before Christmas.” Amy’s favorite hobbies are drawing, and writing in her journal. Amy admits to being overweight and having poofy hair in middle school. She says that three words that best describe her are unique, sympathetic, and misunderstood. Amy is usually portrayed as having black hair (but is a natural blonde), usually black eyeliner, pale blue eyes, and usually wears dark or Victorian age clothing.

Amy Lee and her band interest me because they have guiding lyrics, an amazing sound, and an amazing style.
